class  wxEcComplex
 A complex number. More...

Detailed Description

Manages complex numbers.

Author:
ecrucru
Version:
0.6.3
Date:
January 2009
This file defines a class to manage complex numbers. They have a real and imaginary part. Operators are provided to make operations.

New functions are also added : cos, sin... defined in the complex domain. The reference is http://functions.wolfram.com/ElementaryFunctions/

Generated on Sun Feb 28 12:06:47 2010 for wxEcMath - Official documentation by  1.5.6
